Incredible growth for cross-territory, multiple language e-commerce site

EGO Power+ wanted to provide customers across all existing territories - and new ones - with a much better user experience. To handle multiple languages in multiple territories, we built a single codebase that has, so far, launched websites in 17 territories and eight languages. This powerful web development is cost-effective to recreate for launching the brand into new markets. It has been an essential component to EGO’s success, supporting strategic investment into its cross-channel marketing strategy and driving growth across multiple markets.

Reach

Connect with your ideal customers

We place your brand in front of the right people at crucial stages of the purchasing journey, using data-driven marketing strategies.

Our strategies drive relevant traffic to your website by creating a direct response and action. We utilise key data (macro and micro) to inform our plans so we carry on hitting your targets. Your REACH objectives are measurable, so your decisions can be justified with data like brand awareness, traffic levels, ad interactions, social engagement and impressions.

Convert

Use data to improve your bottom line

We challenge your website to be the best it can by responding to changing customer needs through continuous experimentation.

We'll push it to its limits and make it work harder using a comprehensive data-led approach of testing and iteration, which is proven to increase conversion rates and customer value. Your CONVERT objectives are measurable, so your decisions can be justified with data like conversion rates, average order values, repeat customer rates, lifetime order values.
